About the Company: Rasi Electrodes Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of MMAW electrodes & marketing of welding consumables under the brand name of Rasi.They also offer a complete range of welding Solutions.The Product range of the company includes:Conventional-Mild Steel,Pipe Welding,Low Hydrogen,Stainless Steel,Cast Iron,Hard Facing and Cutting & Gouging.Low Heat Input Welding Alloys-For Steels,For Disimilar Steels,For Cast Iron,For Stainless Steels,For Copper & Non Ferrous Alloys,For Nickel & Nickel Alloys,For HardSurfacing & Wear Resistant and For Cutting & Gouging. CCMS Wires.MIG/TIG Wires.Flux Cored Wires.SAW Wires & Flux.Welding Rectifier.Welding Transformer.Silver Brazing Wires.MIG/MAG Machines.
